author: et
content:
While the findings is factually there, one still cannot deny that a government can use FinSpy 'service' running from any public IP or servers in the world. As indicated, it is on public hosted servers, right? They may not know the full potential of what it can do as yet.... ;)

Also, the article only mentioned 'Malaysia spying' but did not name the government as the culprit. We interpret it as such.
